meanings.definition: A process or period of time in which one abstains from or rids the body of toxic or unhealthy substances.
meanings.sent1: After the holidays, many people start a detox to cleanse their bodies.
meanings.sent2: She went to a spa for a detox to remove toxins from her body.
meanings.sent3: The detox retreat promised to make participants feel like new after the cleanse.
meanings.sent4: The detox program was like hitting a reset button for her health.
meanings.sent5: The detox diet made her feel refreshed and energized.

meanings.definition: To rid the body of toxic or unhealthy substances.
meanings.sent1: He decided to detox by cutting out sugary drinks from his diet.
meanings.sent2: She wanted to detox her body after a weekend of indulgence.
meanings.sent3: The fridge detox was long overdue, as it was filled with expired items.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she needed to detox her mind from negative thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The yoga session helped her detox and unwind after a stressful day.
